Cyber, how did the shields go back up on the trainer base when the 
generator that activated them shorted out? In case anyone doesnt know 
what im talking about heres a portion of the post in which they did:

The Vile Cannon struck the shields shorting out the generator 
powering it. Three more anchors snapped and the base rocked into the 
air and crashed down causing a gust of sand to rise through the air.
